answers.answer: I dont either...haha..it sounds like you may very well be pregnant. I think urine test cause much unneedd stress. I would see about getting a blood test done if it were me.

My husband wants me to go to the doctor too. He's told me he was worried about me. He's noticed the difference in my cloths and told me that my belly sticks out further than my boobs. He was worried also b/c I started shaking all over after we walked through the coffee isle. We've been trying for a year a 2 mths. My son needs someone to play with.
aww...well i hope it's a positive.  Make sure to let us know as soon as u do

i dont no if i am pregnant  , i am 18.  i took a ept test on july  and came out positive but i go to the doctors  when i found out , they said my test came back saying i was not . a week after i was bleeding very light  but for 2 weeks and the i went to the hosiptal and then they said it was nothing and then i started to bleed again. a week ago i went to a different doc and she says maybe i had a m/c  ,but that i was not pregrnant . i dont no what to do my period still havent came and i gain 20 pounds  since july

If you gained weight then your hormones are out of wack. I would wait patiently and treat yourself like you are. It's not going to hurt to take vitamines and excersise. My doctor prescribed me vitamins when I told her I wanted to get pregnant. I work out three times a week and it helps with the stress during the week. I started gainig weight even though I work out, so that left me questioning if I might be or not too. I just know I have to wait is out b/c pee tests don'/t do me any good. If you don't start your period in two mths then I would get a blood test. That's what I've been doing. Atleast I know I'm healthy for the baby and that's all that matters. I have PCOS and type II diabetes and that puts my periods all out of wack. So, I can't count on a missed period telling me either. I've been walking a lot and every time I've ever walked 4-5 time a week I either start my period or ,like with my son, I was prego. Not saying that would work for you, but for some weird reason the more walking or running I do, the more chance I have a period that mth. I hope this helps.

question: I was late for my period last mth and then it started (I thought?) last wk of Sept with only 5 days of wiping blood. I pretty much didn't need a pad or anything. It was only showing when I went to the bathroom. Well,week after, my breasts got sore, got heartburn bad, felt bloaded, forgetful, tired, nausia ( but no throw up), and constipation. Well, this week, back started to hurt, my pants won't button up, my shirt won't button at the bottom, and I went down the coffee isle at the store and wanted to hurl. I took preg test after bleed and came out neg. so I will take one after I know I'm late again. What do you think? I was preg w/ my son and didn't know it until 5th mth b/c wouldn't show on pee test. So I don't trust the pee test.
title: Pregnancy???
